page.title: 01The Blue Pool ref.186478
page.content: { The Blue Pool}can be found on the top of the Horse Shoe Pass It is the remains of a slate quarry called Moel y Fean. Near it is a cafe and there is a track going to it which is also used by motor bikes.The quarry is disused. Sub-aqua clubs from all over Britain use it. It is 45 feet deep and there are hardly any plants and no fish. The colour comes from the slate. There are cars in it. The water is very clear. {The Green Pool}. It can be found in the same place as the Blue pool but it is not on the track. It is bigger than the blue pool. The green pool is also used by divers from all over Britain and is 65 feet deep with no fish and hardly any plants. It has a few cars at the bottom but none on the banks.
